video.title: The Mysteries of Laura
video.synopsis: A stressed-out New York homicide detective solves gruesome crimes by day and takes care of unruly twin boys by night.

episodes.synopsis: Ace homicide detective Laura Diamond does her best to balance a demanding job with her hectic home life and a pending divorce.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When an online dating hookup ends in murder, Laura goes undercover in New York's hottest night spots. Meanwhile, she examines her own romantic future.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Dead Date

episodes.synopsis: After the owner of a biker bar is killed, Laura and Jake investigate the scene of the crime, which was also the location of their first date.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Biker Bar

episodes.synopsis: When a powerful congressman's campaign is tainted by a sex scandal, Laura must find out the truth about his alleged mistress.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Sex Scandal

episodes.synopsis: The team must identify a murdered man found in a bathroom. Laura and Jake try an innovative solution to their shared custody issues.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Terminal Tenant

episodes.synopsis: When a designer's intern is murdered during Fashion Week, Laura and Billy question several stylish suspects. Jake examines Max's role at the precinct.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Red Runway

episodes.synopsis: An art gallery owner is murdered in Koreatown, prompting an investigation into the karaoke scene. Laura is reunited with her estranged father.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Art Ace

episodes.synopsis: When a woman is found dead on a party bus, Laura and the team take on a beauty empire and its leader to uncover the truth behind the murder.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Mobile Murder

episodes.synopsis: Laura and the team investigate to determine if a religious motive was at play when a couple is found murdered in their apartment.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Dysfunctional Dynasty

episodes.synopsis: The team is immersed in the world of horse racing when a fertility doctor disappears. Laura's stress is compounded when the twins are called bullies.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Fertility Fatality

episodes.synopsis: When a sous chef's frozen body is found at a dump, the detectives look closely at the restaurant industry, and Laura is smitten with a suspect.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Frozen Foodie

episodes.synopsis: When arson is suspected in a teenager's death, Jake is reunited with a former flame, while Laura focuses on the boys' winter carnival.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Fateful Fire

episodes.synopsis: When an elite prep school's star athlete is killed, the detectives go undercover and uncover a dark side of the posh educational institution.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Deemed Dealer

episodes.synopsis: When a drag queen is found murdered, the team's investigation leads them somewhere unexpected. Laura reconnects with an old friend.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Popped Pugilist

episodes.synopsis: When an attractive nanny is found dead, the detectives take a close look at an escort ring. Jake and Laura are the focus of an internal investigation.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Alluring Au Pair

episodes.synopsis: When a former beauty queen is stabbed, Laura reunites with her pompous ex-fiancé, who's the prime suspect in the crime.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Exsanguinated Ex

episodes.synopsis: An intern at a tech startup is murdered. Meanwhile, Laura has a new man in her life, but she's too busy to spend time with him.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Intoxicated Intern

episodes.synopsis: Laura dodges her birthday while probing the murder of a sailor, while Billy is forced to work alongside a headstrong naval investigator.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Sunken Sailor

episodes.synopsis: The detectives get an inside view of NCAA basketball while trying to solve the murder of a teacher's aide. Laura deals with an epic personal crisis.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Dodgy Draft

episodes.synopsis: Laura and the team investigate the murder of a club kid, which may be linked to a string of jewel heists in the Diamond District.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Crooked Clubber

episodes.synopsis: When a young filmmaker is found dead, an amateur detective's meddling causes complications with Laura and the team's investigation.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Deceased Documentarian

episodes.synopsis: Jake is wounded while on duty, so Laura and her team must hunt down his shooter: a high-tech criminal armed with a sophisticated weapon.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Corner Store Crossfire
